Reference

All functions

add_balancing_vector()

Adds a balancing vector to the Balancing matrix

calc_bilateral_trade_df_gma()

Calculates bilateral trade data frame associated with Global Market Assumption

calc_global_exports()

Calculates global exports by product

calc_global_production_by_product()

Calculates global production by product

calc_imports_by_product()

Calculates total imports by product, for each country, for each year.

calc_national_production_by_product()

Calculates the national production by product

calc_share_exports_by_product()

Calculates the share of exports for each product, by country

calc_share_global_production_by_product()

Calculates for each product the share of global production by country

calc_share_imports_by_products()

Calculates the shares of imports to total consumption by product, for each country and year.

calc_total_consumption_by_product()

Calculates total consumption by product, for each country and year

check_bilateral_trade_df()

Checks bilateral trade data

convert_fuel_gasoline_into_motor_gasoline()

Converts jet fuel type gasoline into motor gasoline

convert_to_net_trade()

Converts data to net trade data

extract_tidy_industry_erois()

Extracts industry level EROIs from tidy Input Output matrices

extract_tidy_product_erois()

Extracts product level EROIs from tidy Input Output matrices

find_list_dta_observations()

Find list of observations for which Domestic Technology Assumption is applicable

international_bunkers_to_balancing()

Moves international bunkers flows to the Balancing matrix

specify_MR_R()

Specifies Multi-Regional R matrix

specify_MR_V()

Specifies Multi-Regional V matrix

specify_MR_Y_U_bta()

Specifies Multi-Regional final demand (Y) and use (U) matrices with Bilateral Trade Assumption

specify_MR_Y_U_gma()

Specifies Multi-Regional final demand (Y) and use (U) matrices with Global Market Assumption

specify_imported_products()

Specifies imported and domestic products

stat_diffs_to_balancing()

Moving statistical differences flows to Balancing matrix

stock_changes_to_balancing()

Moving stock changes flows to Balancing matrix

tidy_AB_data

tidy_AB_data

transform_to_bta()

Transforms to Bilateral Trade Assumption

transform_to_dta()

Transforms to Domestic Technology Assumption

transform_to_gma()

Transforms to Global Market Assumption
